content: I'm really excited to pair the blouse with my new distressed denim jeans. I've been wanting to wear them together for a while now, and I think they'll look great with the black ankle boots. I've also been thinking about investing in a good quality leather handbag to complement my outfit. Speaking of decluttering, I also donated 3 dresses to Goodwill during the same period, which made room for some new pieces.
